name: Madfarms
description:
On a rural farm, Joe Cleetus, son of a respected farmer, stumbles upon an extra-terrestrial artifact that could destroy human life as we know it! When young Joe tries to rebel against alien forces, chaos ensues...

This is a small snippet of our upcoming indie game: Madfarms! It's unclear to when the full game releases, but our estimate is 2-4 months from now. This download includes a demo of the final boss battle, and the introduction.

An Acid Crow Game.
